page.title: 11Antiques in Debenham (1).
page.content: Debenham has an unusually large number of antique shops and people employed in the furniture trade. The present owner has been in Dove Antique Shop since 1984.She stocks mainly Victorian,Edwardian and 1920s porcelain,silverware and furniture.She intends to keep small items,suitable for presents, and hopes to turn the outbuildings into a teashop. In contrast,Flemings Antiques stock expensive items from earlier periods. They used to deal mainly in Tudor oak furniture which was in vogue twenty years ago,but this is now hard to obtain.There is now a demand for later, less cumbersome pieces such as seventeenth,eighteenth and nineteenth century furniture for the dining room, sitting room and garden.They have supplied antiques to farmers, politicians and pop stars.
